_sText:
This is the 5th and  final version of my attempt to convert the original cs_italy into a bomb defuse map. This process started relatively simple but over the months I found it necessary to change more and more about the map to make it work as a fair, competitive and fun defuse map . Besides gameplay and layout changes I also slowly added more and more details to make the map feel a bit more fresh and up to date.

Im now finally happy with the result. It looks good enough and it plays very well in my opinion. But most importantly, while making quite significant changes, I think, I still retained the feeling of key areas of the original map as well as the feel of the map in general. But that’s ultimately for you to decide.

The map has 50 slots – just for good measure.

Have fun.
